name: in-Wasm end-to-end framework
body:
Thanks to the contribution by @anuraaga, now Proxy-Wasm Go SDK has support for directly testing your Proxy-Wasm binary in the Wasm virtual machine powered by [wazero.io](https://wazero.io). More precisely, the `proxytest` package can be used to run either your plugins on your native machine or the compiled Wasm binary inside a Wasm virtual machine. Regardless of choice, the same emulation test code can be used. See [this example](https://github.com/tetratelabs/proxy-wasm-go-sdk/blob/a7080deebc8c4fca2099b81e6af924dc7208d402/examples/http_body/main_test.go#L290-L310) for the demonstration.

Enjoy!

Contributors: @mathetake @anuraaga @codefromthecrypt 
Code changes: https://github.com/tetratelabs/proxy-wasm-go-sdk/compare/v0.19.0...v0.20.0

name: proxytest: case-intensive headers and trailers
body:
Now the proxytest framework becomes case-intensive on headers and trailers just like Envoy implementations.
Thank you @jlourenc for the contribution! 

https://github.com/tetratelabs/proxy-wasm-go-sdk/compare/v0.18.0...v0.19.0

name: TinyGo 0.23.0 support
body:
This is the first release verified to work with TinyGo 0.23.0.

Enjoy!


https://github.com/tetratelabs/proxy-wasm-go-sdk/compare/v0.17.0...v0.18.0

name: Fixes an edge case bug in dispatched callbacks
body:
This contains a bug fix for an edge-case with HTTP dispatches:
If a plugin sends a local reply in dispatched callbacks and the connection
has been terminated, then wasm VM crashes and eventually, envoy fails 
to recover and envoy process exits with an uncaught exception.
See #270 for detail.

https://github.com/tetratelabs/proxy-wasm-go-sdk/compare/v0.16.0...v0.17.0

name: Fix nil panic around OnTick
body: Fixes https://github.com/tetratelabs/proxy-wasm-go-sdk/issues/201 by https://github.com/tetratelabs/proxy-wasm-go-sdk/pull/202; missing call of setActiveContext in onTick callback in ABI. Thanks @abhide for reporting this! 🚀

name: Introduction of VMContext, and PluginContext
body: This tag is intentionally cut as v0.13.0 which seems odd considering that the previous one is cut with v0.3.0.  The point is that we mistakenly cut v0.12.0 a few months ago, and we've already delete it, but it is still referenced as a "latest" by pkg.go.dev (https://pkg.go.dev/github.com/tetratelabs/proxy-wasm-go-sdk). That's why we cut 0.13.0 for now as a workaround. In anyway, the tag is just a tag so we hope this wouldn't be a problem:) Enjoy!

name: update ABI version to support istio/proxyv2
